A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was such a let down after the Force Awakens and Rouge One. It is filled with plot holes\, needless storyline and poor editing. It has horrible continuity and seems like it was just Disney advertising there new range of annoying merchandise. This had so much promise\, there are some real quality actors and parts of the story that just needed development. In the end though it was like a hot dropped pie\, it had good ingredients and could had been great\, but instead it's a steaming heap.
